metadata.og:title: Lievin de Winne. Portrait of H.M. Leopold I
metadata.og:description: KU Leuven. Glass slides art history. Université de Louvain, between 1839 and 1939. Photographer unknown. Added information on slide. More information about the depicted object: Fabritius (Online catalogue of the Royal Museums of Fine Arts of Belgium in Brussels): inv. nr. 4155. Creation/Building: 1860-1861. Technique/Material: Oil on canvas. Current location: Belgium, Brussels, Royal Museums of Fine Arts of Belgium. EuroPhot. Art History. 19th century. Painting. Portrait. EuroPhot. Art history. 19th century. Paintings. Portrait. EuroPhot. Art History. 19th century. Study. EuroPhot. Art history. 19th century. Study.
